summary: During WWII the valet to the British Ambassador to Ankara sells British secrets to the Germans while trying to romance a refugee Polish countess.
cast: James Mason|Danielle Darrieux|Michael Rennie|Walter Hampden|Oskar Karlweis|Herbert Berghof|John Wengraf|Ben Astar|Roger Plowden|Diane Adrian|Hanna Axmann-Rezzori|Salvador Baguez|David Bauer|Maurice Brierre|Alexis Davidoff|Lawrence Dobkin|Antonio Filauri|Martin Garralaga|Stuart Hall|Lumsden Hare|Yeghishe Harout|Frank Hemingway|Paul H. Jackson|Aram Katcher|Faith Kruger|Stanley Logan|Richard Loo|Lester Matthews|Keith McConnell|Frank McLure|Alberto Morin|Neyle Morrow|Jeroma Moshan|Leo Mostovoy|Nestor Paiva|Michael Pate|John Candan Rahmi|Suzanne Ridgway|Gene Roth|Konstantin Shayne|Marc Snow|John Sutton|Sadik Tarlan|Walter Theil|Ivan Triesault|Joan Van Dyke|Otto Waldis|Patrick White|Alfred Zeisler
title: Operación Cicerón
